g.text: Int. J. Environ. Res. Public Health
Category Countries China The USA Australia
Common type of coal miners: KN95 and
pressure respirators, including N, R, P
including N100, R100, and P100 ﬁlters
Common type of coal miners: N95 (or higher)
related respiratory protection for workers exposed
to different respirable coal mine dust and
classes of particulate ﬁlters, P1, P2, and P3
Common type of coal miners: P1 and half mask
intake air at underground mines and for ‘part
90’ miners (coal miners who have evidence of
Two main states of a coal mine (TWA)
Personal sampling (8 h and in their
breathing zone for an extended period of
Note: Black coal includes anthracite, bituminous coal, and sub-bituminous coal; Brown coal includes lignite (coal classiﬁcation terminology in Australia); TWA: Threshold Limit Value.
